description: We work in partnership with the London boroughs, providing funding for a range of transport projects

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We allocate money to the London boroughs to spend on projects that support the Mayor's Transport Strategy through a Local Implementation Plan."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Find more information and guidance on the LIPs page in Boroughs .
